1438std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::partition(const std::unordered_map<long, double> &cellWeights, bool trackPartitioning, bool squeezeStorage)
1439{
1440 partitioningPrepare(cellWeights, false);
1441
1442 std::vector<adaption::Info> partitioningData = partitioningAlter(trackPartitioning, squeezeStorage);
1443
1444 partitioningCleanup();
1445
1446 return partitioningData;
1447}
1448
1462std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::partitioningPrepare(MPI_Comm communicator, const std::unordered_map<long, int> &cellRanks, bool trackPartitioning, std::size_t haloSize)
1463{
1464 setCommunicator(communicator);
1465
1466 setHaloSize(haloSize);
1467
1468 return partitioningPrepare(cellRanks, trackPartitioning);
1469}
1470
1481std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::partitioningPrepare(const std::unordered_map<long, int> &cellRanks, bool trackPartitioning)
1482{
1483 // Patch needs to support partitioning
1484 if (!isPartitioningSupported()) {
1485 throw std::runtime_error ("The patch does not support partitioning!");
1486 }
1487
1488 // Communicator has to be set
1489 if (!isCommunicatorSet()) {
1490 throw std::runtime_error ("There is no communicator set for the patch.");
1491 }
1492
1493 // Check partitioning status
1494 PartitioningStatus partitioningStatus = getPartitioningStatus(true);
1495 if (partitioningStatus != PARTITIONING_CLEAN) {
1496 throw std::runtime_error ("A partitioning is already in progress.");
1497 }
1498
1499 std::vector<adaption::Info> partitioningData = _partitioningPrepare(cellRanks, trackPartitioning);
1500
1501 // Update the status
1502 setPartitioningStatus(PARTITIONING_PREPARED);
1503
1504 return partitioningData;
1505}
1506
1519std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::partitioningPrepare(MPI_Comm communicator, bool trackPartitioning, std::size_t haloSize)
1520{
1521 setCommunicator(communicator);
1522
1523 setHaloSize(haloSize);
1524
1525 std::unordered_map<long, double> dummyCellWeights;
1526
1527 return partitioningPrepare(dummyCellWeights, trackPartitioning);
1528}
1529
1539std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::partitioningPrepare(bool trackPartitioning)
1540{
1541 std::unordered_map<long, double> dummyCellWeights;
1542
1543 return partitioningPrepare(dummyCellWeights, trackPartitioning);
1544}
1545
1561std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::partitioningPrepare(MPI_Comm communicator, const std::unordered_map<long, double> &cellWeights, bool trackPartitioning, std::size_t haloSize)
1562{
1563 setCommunicator(communicator);
1564
1565 setHaloSize(haloSize);
1566
1567 return partitioningPrepare(cellWeights, trackPartitioning);
1568}
1569
1582std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::partitioningPrepare(const std::unordered_map<long, double> &cellWeights, bool trackPartitioning)
1583{
1584 // Patch needs to support partitioning
1585 if (!isPartitioningSupported()) {
1586 throw std::runtime_error ("The patch does not support partitioning!");
1587 }
1588
1589 // Check partitioning status
1590 PartitioningStatus partitioningStatus = getPartitioningStatus(true);
1591 if (partitioningStatus != PARTITIONING_CLEAN) {
1592 throw std::runtime_error ("A partitioning is already in progress.");
1593 }
1594
1595 // Execute the partitioning preparation
1596 std::vector<adaption::Info> partitioningData = _partitioningPrepare(cellWeights, DEFAULT_PARTITIONING_WEIGTH, trackPartitioning);
1597
1598 // Update the status
1599 setPartitioningStatus(PARTITIONING_PREPARED);
1600
1601 return partitioningData;
1602}
1603
1619std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::partitioningAlter(bool trackPartitioning, bool squeezeStorage)
1620{
1621 std::vector<adaption::Info> partitioningData;
1622 if (!isPartitioningSupported()) {
1623 return partitioningData;
1624 }
1625
1626 // Check partitioning status
1627 PartitioningStatus partitioningStatus = getPartitioningStatus();
1628 if (partitioningStatus == PARTITIONING_CLEAN) {
1629 return partitioningData;
1630 } else if (partitioningStatus != PARTITIONING_PREPARED) {
1631 throw std::runtime_error ("The prepare function has no been called.");
1632 }
1633
1634 // Partition the patch
1635 partitioningData = _partitioningAlter(trackPartitioning);
1636
1637 // Finalize patch alterations
1638 finalizeAlterations(squeezeStorage);
1639
1640 // Update the status
1641 setPartitioningStatus(PARTITIONING_ALTERED);
1642
1643 return partitioningData;
1644}
1645
1652void PatchKernel::partitioningCleanup()
1653{
1654 if (!isPartitioningSupported()) {
1655 return;
1656 }
1657
1658 PartitioningStatus partitioningStatus = getPartitioningStatus();
1659 if (partitioningStatus == PARTITIONING_CLEAN) {
1660 return;
1661 } else if (partitioningStatus == PARTITIONING_PREPARED) {
1662 throw std::runtime_error ("It is not yet possible to abort a partitioning.");
1663 } else if (partitioningStatus != PARTITIONING_ALTERED) {
1664 throw std::runtime_error ("The alter function has no been called.");
1665 }
1666
1667 // Clean-up the partitioning
1668 _partitioningCleanup();
1669
1670 if (m_partitioningOutgoings.size() > 0) {
1671 std::unordered_map<long, int>().swap(m_partitioningOutgoings);
1672 }
1673
1674 // Update the status
1675 setPartitioningStatus(PARTITIONING_CLEAN);
1676}
1677
1686bool PatchKernel::isPartitioned() const
1687{
1688 return (getProcessorCount() > 1);
1689}
1690
1696bool PatchKernel::isPartitioningSupported() const
1697{
1698 return (getPartitioningStatus() != PARTITIONING_UNSUPPORTED);
1699}
1700
1707PatchKernel::PartitioningStatus PatchKernel::getPartitioningStatus(bool global) const
1708{
1709 int partitioningStatus = static_cast<int>(m_partitioningStatus);
1710
1711 if (global && isPartitioned()) {
1712 const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
1713 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &partitioningStatus, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_MAX, communicator);
1714 }
1715
1716 return static_cast<PartitioningStatus>(partitioningStatus);
1717}
1718
1724void PatchKernel::setPartitioningStatus(PartitioningStatus status)
1725{
1726 m_partitioningStatus = status;
1727}
1728
1729
1745double PatchKernel::evalPartitioningUnbalance() const
1746{
1747 std::unordered_map<long, double> dummyCellWeights;
1748
1749 return evalPartitioningUnbalance(dummyCellWeights);
1750}
1751
1760double PatchKernel::evalPartitioningUnbalance(const std::unordered_map<long, double> &cellWeights) const
1761{
1762 if (!isPartitioned()) {
1763 return 0.;
1764 }
1765
1766 // Evaluate partition weight
1767 double partitionWeight;
1768 if (!cellWeights.empty()) {
1769 CellConstIterator beginItr = internalCellConstBegin();
1770 CellConstIterator endItr = internalCellConstEnd();
1771
1772 partitionWeight = 0.;
1773 for (CellConstIterator cellItr = beginItr; cellItr != endItr; ++cellItr) {
1774 long cellId = cellItr.getId();
1775
1776 double cellWeight;
1777 auto weightItr = cellWeights.find(cellId);
1778 if (weightItr != cellWeights.end()) {
1779 cellWeight = weightItr->second;
1780 } else {
1781 cellWeight = DEFAULT_PARTITIONING_WEIGTH;
1782 }
1783
1784 partitionWeight += cellWeight;
1785 }
1786 } else {
1787 partitionWeight = DEFAULT_PARTITIONING_WEIGTH * getInternalCellCount();
1788 }
1789
1790 // Evalaute global weights
1791 double totalPartitionWeight;
1792 MPI_Allreduce(&partitionWeight, &totalPartitionWeight, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, getCommunicator());
1793
1794 double maximumPartitionWeight;
1795 MPI_Allreduce(&partitionWeight, &maximumPartitionWeight, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, getCommunicator());
1796
1797 double meanPartitionWeight = totalPartitionWeight / getProcessorCount();
1798
1799 // Evaluate the unbalance
1800 double unbalance = (maximumPartitionWeight / meanPartitionWeight - 1.);
1801
1802 return unbalance;
1803}
1804
1808#if BITPIT_ENABLE_METIS==1
1816#else
1821#endif
1834std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::_partitioningPrepare(const std::unordered_map<long, double> &cellWeights, double defaultWeight, bool trackPartitioning)
1835{
1836 // Check if the patch needs a non-trivial partitioning
1837 //
1838 // A non-trivial partitioning is needed only if the patch is not empty
1839 // and if there are multiple processes associated with the patch.
1840 bool isCellRankEvaluationNeeded = (!empty(true) && (getProcessorCount() > 1));
1841
1842 // Default partitioning can only be used when the patch is all on a single process
1843 if (isCellRankEvaluationNeeded) {
1844 if (isDistributed()) {
1845 throw std::runtime_error("Default partitioning can only be used when the patch is all on a single process");
1846 }
1847 }
1848
1849 // Evaluate partitioning
1850 //
1851 // Only the owner of the patch need to evaluate the partitioning.
1852#if BITPIT_ENABLE_METIS==1
1853 std::unordered_map<long, int> cellRanks;
1854 if (isCellRankEvaluationNeeded && getRank() == getOwner()) {
1855 // Initialize map between patch vertices and METIS nodes
1856 //
1857 // METIS node numbering needs to be contiguous and needs to start from zero.
1858 std::unordered_map<long, idx_t> vertexToNodeMap;
1859
1860 idx_t nodeId = 0;
1861 for (const Vertex &vertex : m_vertices) {
1862 vertexToNodeMap[vertex.getId()] = nodeId;
1863 ++nodeId;
1864 }
1865
1866 // Create METIS mesh
1867 idx_t nElements = getInternalCellCount();
1868 idx_t nNodes = getInternalVertexCount();
1869
1870 idx_t connectSize = 0;
1871 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells){
1872 connectSize += static_cast<idx_t>(cell.getVertexCount());
1873 }
1874
1875 std::vector<idx_t> connectStorage(connectSize);
1876 std::vector<idx_t> connectRanges(nElements + 1);
1877 std::vector<idx_t> elementWeights(nElements, static_cast<idx_t>(std::max(defaultWeight, 1.)));
1878
1879 idx_t i = 0;
1880 idx_t j = 0;
1881 connectRanges[0] = 0;
1882 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
1883 // Element connectivity
1884 for (long vertex : cell.getVertexIds()) {
1885 connectStorage[j] = vertexToNodeMap[vertex];
1886 ++j;
1887 }
1888 connectRanges[i + 1] = j;
1889
1890 // Element weight
1891 auto weightItr = cellWeights.find(cell.getId());
1892 if (weightItr != cellWeights.end()) {
1893 elementWeights[i] = static_cast<idx_t>(std::max(std::round(weightItr->second), 1.));
1894 }
1895
1896 // Increase counters
1897 i++;
1898 }
1899
1900 // Get the number of common nodes two elements should share to be considered neighbours
1901 idx_t nCommonNodes = getDimension();
1902
1903 // Get the number of partitions the mesh should be split into
1904 idx_t nPartitions = getProcessorCount();
1905
1906 // Evaluate partitioning
1907 idx_t objectiveValue;
1908
1909 std::vector<idx_t> elementRanks(nElements);
1910 std::vector<idx_t> nodeRanks(nNodes);
1911
1912 int status = METIS_PartMeshDual(&nElements, &nNodes, connectRanges.data(), connectStorage.data(),
1913 elementWeights.data(), nullptr, &nCommonNodes, &nPartitions, nullptr,
1914 nullptr, &objectiveValue, elementRanks.data(), nodeRanks.data());
1915
1916 if (status != METIS_OK) {
1917 throw std::runtime_error("Error during partitioning (METIS error " + std::to_string(status) + ")");
1918 }
1919
1920 // Fill the cell ranks
1921 int metisId = 0;
1922 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
1923 int metisRank = static_cast<int>(elementRanks[metisId]);
1924 if (metisRank != getRank()) {
1925 cellRanks[cell.getId()] = metisRank;
1926 }
1927 ++metisId;
1928 }
1929 }
1930
1931 return _partitioningPrepare(cellRanks, trackPartitioning);
1932#else
1933 BITPIT_UNUSED(cellWeights);
1934 BITPIT_UNUSED(defaultWeight);
1935 BITPIT_UNUSED(trackPartitioning);
1936
1937 throw std::runtime_error("METIS library is required for automatic patch partitioning.");
1938#endif
1939}
1940
1951std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::_partitioningPrepare(const std::unordered_map<long, int> &cellRanks, bool trackPartitioning)
1952{
1953 // Fill partitioning ranks
1954 int patchRank = getRank();
1955
1956 std::set<int> recvRanks;
1957 m_partitioningOutgoings.clear();
1958 for (auto &entry : cellRanks) {
1959 int recvRank = entry.second;
1960 if (recvRank == patchRank) {
1961 continue;
1962 }
1963
1964 long cellId = entry.first;
1965 if (m_ghostCellInfo.count(cellId) > 0) {
1966 continue;
1967 }
1968
1969 m_partitioningOutgoings.insert(entry);
1970 recvRanks.insert(recvRank);
1971 }
1972
1973 // Identify exchange entries
1974 int nRanks = getProcessorCount();
1975
1976 int nExchanges = recvRanks.size();
1977 std::vector<std::pair<int, int>> exchanges;
1978 exchanges.reserve(nExchanges);
1979 for (int recvRank : recvRanks) {
1980 exchanges.emplace_back(patchRank, recvRank);
1981 }
1982
1983 int exchangesGatherCount = 2 * nExchanges;
1984 std::vector<int> exchangeGatherCount(nRanks);
1985 MPI_Allgather(&exchangesGatherCount, 1, MPI_INT, exchangeGatherCount.data(), 1, MPI_INT, m_communicator);
1986
1987 std::vector<int> exchangesGatherDispls(nRanks, 0);
1988 for (int i = 1; i < nRanks; ++i) {
1989 exchangesGatherDispls[i] = exchangesGatherDispls[i - 1] + exchangeGatherCount[i - 1];
1990 }
1991
1992 int nGlobalExchanges = nExchanges;
1993 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &nGlobalExchanges, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_SUM, m_communicator);
1994
1995 m_partitioningGlobalExchanges.resize(nGlobalExchanges);
1996 MPI_Allgatherv(exchanges.data(), exchangesGatherCount, MPI_INT, m_partitioningGlobalExchanges.data(),
1997 exchangeGatherCount.data(), exchangesGatherDispls.data(), MPI_INT, m_communicator);
1998
1999 std::sort(m_partitioningGlobalExchanges.begin(), m_partitioningGlobalExchanges.end(), greater<std::pair<int,int>>());
2000
2001 // Get global list of ranks that will send data
2002 std::unordered_set<int> globalSendRanks;
2003 for (const std::pair<int, int> &entry : m_partitioningGlobalExchanges) {
2004 globalSendRanks.insert(entry.first);
2005 }
2006
2007 // Get global list of ranks that will receive data
2008 std::unordered_set<int> globalRecvRanks;
2009 for (const std::pair<int, int> &entry : m_partitioningGlobalExchanges) {
2010 globalRecvRanks.insert(entry.second);
2011 }
2012
2013 // Identify if this is a serialization or a normal partitioning
2014 //
2015 // We are serializing the patch if all the processes are sending all
2016 // their cells to the same rank.
2017 m_partitioningSerialization = (globalRecvRanks.size() == 1);
2018 if (m_partitioningSerialization) {
2019 int receiverRank = *(globalRecvRanks.begin());
2020 if (patchRank != receiverRank) {
2021 if (m_partitioningOutgoings.size() != (std::size_t) getInternalCellCount()) {
2022 m_partitioningSerialization = false;
2023 }
2024 }
2025
2026 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &m_partitioningSerialization, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LAND, m_communicator);
2027 }
2028
2029 // Build the information on the cells that will be sent
2030 //
2031 // Only internal cells are tracked.
2032 std::vector<adaption::Info> partitioningData;
2033 if (trackPartitioning) {
2034 for (const std::pair<int, int> &entry : m_partitioningGlobalExchanges) {
2035 int sendRank = entry.first;
2036 if (sendRank != patchRank) {
2037 continue;
2038 }
2039
2040 int recvRank = entry.second;
2041
2042 std::vector<long> previous;
2043 for (const auto &entry : m_partitioningOutgoings) {
2044 int cellRank = entry.second;
2045 if (cellRank != recvRank) {
2046 continue;
2047 }
2048
2049 long cellId = entry.first;
2050 previous.push_back(cellId);
2051 }
2052
2053 if (!previous.empty()) {
2054 partitioningData.emplace_back();
2055 adaption::Info &partitioningInfo = partitioningData.back();
2056 partitioningInfo.entity = adaption::ENTITY_CELL;
2057 partitioningInfo.type = adaption::TYPE_PARTITION_SEND;
2058 partitioningInfo.rank = recvRank;
2059 partitioningInfo.previous = std::move(previous);
2060 }
2061 }
2062 }
2063
2064 return partitioningData;
2065}
2066
2076std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::_partitioningAlter(bool trackPartitioning)
2077{
2078 // Adjacencies need to be up-to-date
2079 updateAdjacencies();
2080
2081 // Ghost final ghost owners
2082 //
2083 // If we are serializing the patch, we need to delete all the ghosts cells.
2084 //
2085 // If we are not serializing the patch, some of the cells that will be send
2086 // during partitioning may be ghosts on other processes. Therefore, we
2087 // need to identify the owners of the ghosts after the partitioning.
2088 std::unordered_map<long, int> ghostCellOwnershipChanges;
2089 if (!m_partitioningSerialization) {
2090 if (isPartitioned()) {
2091 ghostCellOwnershipChanges = _partitioningAlter_evalGhostCellOwnershipChanges();
2092 }
2093 } else {
2094 _partitioningAlter_deleteGhosts();
2095 }
2096
2097 // Communicate patch data structures
2098 int patchRank = getRank();
2099
2100 m_partitioningCellsTag = communications::tags().generate(m_communicator);
2101 m_partitioningVerticesTag = communications::tags().generate(m_communicator);
2102
2103 std::unordered_set<int> batchSendRanks;
2104 std::unordered_set<int> batchRecvRanks;
2105
2106 std::vector<adaption::Info> partitioningData;
2107 std::vector<adaption::Info> rankPartitioningData;
2108 while (!m_partitioningGlobalExchanges.empty()) {
2109 // Add exchanges to the batch
2110 //
2111 // Inside a batch we can mix send and receives, but a process can be
2112 // either a sender or a receiver, it cannot be both.
2113 batchSendRanks.clear();
2114 batchRecvRanks.clear();
2115 while (!m_partitioningGlobalExchanges.empty()) {
2116 const std::pair<int, int> &entry = m_partitioningGlobalExchanges.back();
2117
2118 int entrySendRank = entry.first;
2119 if (batchRecvRanks.count(entrySendRank)) {
2120 break;
2121 }
2122
2123 int entryRecvRank = entry.second;
2124 if (batchSendRanks.count(entryRecvRank)) {
2125 break;
2126 }
2127
2128 batchSendRanks.insert(entrySendRank);
2129 batchRecvRanks.insert(entryRecvRank);
2130 m_partitioningGlobalExchanges.pop_back();
2131 }
2132
2133 // Detect the role of the current process
2134 bool isSender = (batchSendRanks.count(patchRank) > 0);
2135 bool isReceiver = (batchRecvRanks.count(patchRank) > 0);
2136
2137 // Perform sends/receives
2138 if (isSender) {
2139 rankPartitioningData = _partitioningAlter_sendCells(batchRecvRanks, trackPartitioning, &ghostCellOwnershipChanges);
2140 } else if (isReceiver) {
2141 rankPartitioningData = _partitioningAlter_receiveCells(batchSendRanks, trackPartitioning, &ghostCellOwnershipChanges);
2142 }
2143
2144 if (trackPartitioning) {
2145 for (adaption::Info &rankPartitioningInfo : rankPartitioningData) {
2146 partitioningData.emplace_back(std::move(rankPartitioningInfo));
2147 }
2148 }
2149
2150 // Update ghost ownership
2151 for (int sendRank : batchSendRanks) {
2152 _partitioningAlter_applyGhostCellOwnershipChanges(sendRank, &ghostCellOwnershipChanges);
2153 }
2154 }
2155
2156 assert(ghostCellOwnershipChanges.size() == 0);
2157
2158 communications::tags().trash(m_partitioningCellsTag, m_communicator);
2159 communications::tags().trash(m_partitioningVerticesTag, m_communicator);
2160
2161 return partitioningData;
2162}
2163
2175std::unordered_map<long, int> PatchKernel::_partitioningAlter_evalGhostCellOwnershipChanges()
2176{
2177 int patchRank = getRank();
2178
2179 // Initialize communications
2180 //
2181 // The communications will exchange the ranks on ghosts cells.
2182 DataCommunicator notificationCommunicator(getCommunicator());
2183 size_t notificationDataSize = sizeof(patchRank);
2184
2185 // Set and start the receives
2186 for (const auto &entry : getGhostCellExchangeTargets()) {
2187 const int rank = entry.first;
2188 const auto &targetCells = entry.second;
2189
2190 notificationCommunicator.setRecv(rank, targetCells.size() * notificationDataSize);
2191 notificationCommunicator.startRecv(rank);
2192 }
2193
2194 // Set and start the sends
2195 //
2196 // Data buffer is filled with the ranks that will own source cells after
2197 // the partitioning.
2198 for (const auto &entry : getGhostCellExchangeSources()) {
2199 const int rank = entry.first;
2200 auto &sourceCells = entry.second;
2201
2202 notificationCommunicator.setSend(rank, sourceCells.size() * notificationDataSize);
2203 SendBuffer &buffer = notificationCommunicator.getSendBuffer(rank);
2204 for (long id : sourceCells) {
2205 int finalOwner;
2206 if (m_partitioningOutgoings.count(id) > 0) {
2207 finalOwner = m_partitioningOutgoings.at(id);
2208 } else {
2209 finalOwner = patchRank;
2210 }
2211
2212 buffer << finalOwner;
2213 }
2214 notificationCommunicator.startSend(rank);
2215 }
2216
2217 // Receive the final owners of of the ghosts
2218 //
2219 // Data buffer contains the ranks that will own ghost cells after the
2220 // partitioning.
2221 std::unordered_map<long, int> ghostCellOwnershipChanges;
2222
2223 int nCompletedRecvs = 0;
2224 while (nCompletedRecvs < notificationCommunicator.getRecvCount()) {
2225 int rank = notificationCommunicator.waitAnyRecv();
2226 const auto &list = getGhostCellExchangeTargets(rank);
2227
2228 RecvBuffer &buffer = notificationCommunicator.getRecvBuffer(rank);
2229 for (long id : list) {
2230 int finalOwner;
2231 buffer >> finalOwner;
2232
2233 if (finalOwner != m_ghostCellInfo.at(id).owner) {
2234 ghostCellOwnershipChanges[id] = finalOwner;
2235 }
2236 }
2237
2238 ++nCompletedRecvs;
2239 }
2240
2241 // Wait for the sends to finish
2242 notificationCommunicator.waitAllSends();
2243
2244 return ghostCellOwnershipChanges;
2245}
2246
2258void PatchKernel::_partitioningAlter_applyGhostCellOwnershipChanges(int sendRank,
2259 std::unordered_map<long, int> *ghostCellOwnershipChanges)
2260{
2261 for (auto itr = ghostCellOwnershipChanges->begin(); itr != ghostCellOwnershipChanges->end();) {
2262 // Consider only ghosts previously owned by the sender
2263 long ghostCellId = itr->first;
2264 const GhostCellInfo &ghostCellInfo = m_ghostCellInfo.at(ghostCellId);
2265 int previousGhostCellOwner = ghostCellInfo.owner;
2266 if (previousGhostCellOwner != sendRank) {
2267 ++itr;
2268 continue;
2269 }
2270
2271 // Update ghost owner
2272 int finalGhostCellOwner = itr->second;
2273 setGhostCellInfo(ghostCellId, finalGhostCellOwner, ghostCellInfo.haloLayer);
2274 itr = ghostCellOwnershipChanges->erase(itr);
2275 }
2276}
2277
2281void PatchKernel::_partitioningAlter_deleteGhosts()
2282{
2283 // Delete ghost cells
2284 std::vector<long> cellsDeleteList;
2285 cellsDeleteList.reserve(m_ghostCellInfo.size());
2286 for (const auto &entry : m_ghostCellInfo) {
2287 long cellId = entry.first;
2288 cellsDeleteList.emplace_back(cellId);
2289 }
2290
2291 deleteCells(cellsDeleteList);
2292
2293 // Prune stale adjacencies
2294 pruneStaleAdjacencies();
2295
2296 // Prune stale interfaces
2297 //
2298 // Interfaces will be re-created after the partitioning.
2299 pruneStaleInterfaces();
2300
2301 // Delete vertices no longer used
2302 deleteOrphanVertices();
2303
2304 // Convert all ghost vertices to internal vertices
2305 while (getGhostVertexCount() > 0) {
2306 ghostVertex2InternalVertex(m_firstGhostVertexId);
2307 }
2308}
2309
2325std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::_partitioningAlter_sendCells(const std::unordered_set<int> &recvRanks, bool trackPartitioning,
2326 std::unordered_map<long, int> *ghostCellOwnershipChanges)
2327{
2328 // Initialize adaption data
2329 std::vector<adaption::Info> partitioningData;
2330 if (trackPartitioning) {
2331 partitioningData.reserve(recvRanks.size());
2332 }
2333
2334 // Detect if the rank is sending all its cells
2335 std::size_t nOutgoingsOverall = m_partitioningOutgoings.size();
2336 bool sendingAllCells = (nOutgoingsOverall == (std::size_t) getInternalCellCount());
2337
2338 //
2339 // Send data to the receivers
2340 //
2341 const double ACTIVATE_MEMORY_LIMIT_THRESHOLD = 0.15;
2342
2343 int patchDimension = getDimension();
2344
2345 MPI_Request verticesSizeRequest = MPI_REQUEST_NULL;
2346 MPI_Request cellsSizeRequest = MPI_REQUEST_NULL;
2347
2348 MPI_Request verticesRequest = MPI_REQUEST_NULL;
2349 MPI_Request cellsRequest = MPI_REQUEST_NULL;
2350
2351 OBinaryStream verticesBuffer;
2352 OBinaryStream cellsBuffer;
2353
2354 std::vector<long> neighsList;
2355 std::unordered_set<long> frontierNeighs;
2356 std::unordered_set<long> frontierVertices;
2357 std::unordered_set<long> frontierFaceVertices;
2358 std::unordered_set<ConstCellHalfEdge, ConstCellHalfEdge::Hasher> frontierEdges;
2359
2360 std::unordered_set<long> outgoingCells;
2361 std::unordered_set<long> frameCells;
2362 std::unordered_map<long, std::size_t> haloCells;
2363 std::vector<long> firstHaloLayerCells;
2364
2365 std::unordered_set<long> frameVertices;
2366 std::unordered_set<long> haloVertices;
2367
2368 std::vector<long> cellSendList;
2369 std::unordered_set<long> vertexSendList;
2370
2371 std::vector<long> frameCellsOverall;
2372 std::unordered_set<long> ghostHaloCellsOverall;
2373 std::unordered_set<long> innerFrontierCellsOverall;
2374
2375 for (int recvRank : recvRanks) {
2376 //
2377 // Fill the list of cells explicitly marked for sending
2378 //
2379 outgoingCells.clear();
2380 for (const auto &rankEntry : m_partitioningOutgoings) {
2381 int rank = rankEntry.second;
2382 if (rank != recvRank) {
2383 continue;
2384 }
2385
2386 long cellId = rankEntry.first;
2387 outgoingCells.insert(cellId);
2388 }
2389
2390 //
2391 // Identify frame and halo
2392 //
2393 // Along with the cells explicitly marked for sending, we need to send
2394 // also a halo of surrounding cells. Those cells will be used by the
2395 // receiver to connect the cells it receives to the existing cells and
2396 // to generate the ghost cells.
2397 //
2398 // The faces that tell apart cells explicitly marked for sending from
2399 // halo cells are called "frontier faces". We can identify frontier
2400 // faces looping through the outgoing cells an looking for faces with
2401 // a neighbour not explicitly marked for being sent to the receiver
2402 // rank.
2403 //
2404 // Frame is made up by cells explicitly marked for being sent to the
2405 // receiver rank that have a face, an edge or a vertex on a frontier
2406 // face.
2407 //
2408 // The first layer of halo cells is made up by cells not explicitly
2409 // marked for being sent to the receiver that have a face, an edge
2410 // or a vertex on a frontier face. Cells on subsequent halo layers
2411 // are identifies as cells not explicitly marked for being sent
2412 // that are neighbours of the the previous halo layer. At this
2413 // stage we are only building the first layer of halo cells.
2414 //
2415 // We also identify outgoing cells that have a face/edge/vertex on
2416 // the inner frontier. A face/edge/vertex is on the inner frontier
2417 // if its on the frontier and one of the cells that contain that
2418 // item is not an outgoing cell (i.e., is not explicitly marked for
2419 // being sent to any rank). Cells on inner frontier will belong to
2420 // the first layer of ghost cells for the current rank.
2421 //
2422 // There are no halo nor frame cells if we are serializing a patch.
2423 //
2424 // NOTE: for three-dimensional unstructured non-conformal meshes we
2425 // need to explicitly search cells that have an edge on the frontier,
2426 // searching for cells that have a vertex on the frontier is not
2427 // enough (for unstructured meshes we may have a cell that touches the
2428 // frontier only through an edge).
2429 if (!m_partitioningSerialization) {
2430 haloCells.clear();
2431 frameCells.clear();
2432
2433 frontierVertices.clear();
2434 frontierEdges.clear();
2435 for (long cellId : outgoingCells) {
2436 Cell &cell = m_cells.at(cellId);
2437
2438 const int nFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
2439 for (int face = 0; face < nFaces; ++face) {
2440 int nFaceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount(face);
2441 if (nFaceAdjacencies == 0) {
2442 continue;
2443 }
2444
2445 const long *faceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies(face);
2446 for (int i = 0; i < nFaceAdjacencies; ++i) {
2447 // Check if the we are on the frontier
2448 long neighId = faceAdjacencies[i];
2449 if (outgoingCells.count(neighId) > 0) {
2450 continue;
2451 }
2452
2453 // Select the cell with only one adjacency
2454 long frontierCellId;
2455 long frontierFace;
2456 const Cell *frontierCell;
2457 if (nFaceAdjacencies == 1) {
2458 frontierCellId = cellId;
2459 frontierFace = face;
2460 frontierCell = &cell;
2461 } else {
2462 const Cell &neigh = getCell(neighId);
2463
2464 frontierCellId = neighId;
2465 frontierFace = findAdjoinNeighFace(cell, face, neigh);
2466 frontierCell = &neigh;
2467
2468 assert(frontierFace >= 0);
2469 }
2470
2471 // Clear neighbour list
2472 frontierNeighs.clear();
2473
2474 //
2475 // Add frontier face neighbours
2476 //
2477
2478 // Check if the face is on the inner frontier
2479 //
2480 // To be on the inner frontier, the face needs to be
2481 // on a cell not explicitly marked for being sent to
2482 // any rank. We are iterating on the cells explicitly
2483 // marked for being sent to the receiver rank, hence
2484 // the current cell is definitely an outgoing cell.
2485 // Therefore, the face will be on the inner frontier
2486 // if the neighbour is not an outgoing cell.
2487 bool innerFrontierFace = (m_partitioningOutgoings.count(neighId) == 0);
2488
2489 // Add the neighbours to the list
2490 //
2491 // If the face is on the inner frontier, the outgoing
2492 // cell is the current cell (neighbour cannot be an
2493 // outgoing cell, otherwise the face will not be on
2494 // the inner frontier).
2495 frontierNeighs.insert(cellId);
2496 frontierNeighs.insert(neighId);
2497
2498 if (innerFrontierFace) {
2499 innerFrontierCellsOverall.insert(cellId);
2500 }
2501
2502 //
2503 // Add frontier vertex neighbours
2504 //
2505 ConstProxyVector<int> frontierFaceLocalVerticesIds = frontierCell->getFaceLocalVertexIds(frontierFace);
2506 int nFrontierFaceVertices = frontierFaceLocalVerticesIds.size();
2507
2508 frontierFaceVertices.clear();
2509 for (int k = 0; k < nFrontierFaceVertices; ++k) {
2510 long vertexId = frontierCell->getFaceVertexId(frontierFace, k);
2511 frontierFaceVertices.insert(vertexId);
2512
2513 // Avoid adding duplicate vertices
2514 auto frontierVertexItr = frontierVertices.find(vertexId);
2515 if (frontierVertexItr != frontierVertices.end()) {
2516 continue;
2517 }
2518
2519 // Add vertex to the list of frontier vertices
2520 frontierVertices.insert(vertexId);
2521
2522 // Find vertex neighbours
2523 neighsList.clear();
2524 int vertex = frontierFaceLocalVerticesIds[k];
2525 findCellVertexNeighs(frontierCellId, vertex, &neighsList);
2526
2527 // Check if the vertex is on the inner frontier
2528 bool innerFrontierVertex = (m_partitioningOutgoings.count(frontierCellId) == 0);
2529 if (!innerFrontierVertex) {
2530 for (long frontierNeighId : neighsList) {
2531 if (m_partitioningOutgoings.count(frontierNeighId) == 0) {
2532 innerFrontierVertex = true;
2533 break;
2534 }
2535 }
2536 }
2537
2538 // Add neighbours to the list
2539 for (long frontierNeighId : neighsList) {
2540 frontierNeighs.insert(frontierNeighId);
2541 if (innerFrontierVertex) {
2542 if (m_partitioningOutgoings.count(frontierNeighId) > 0) {
2543 innerFrontierCellsOverall.insert(frontierNeighId);
2544 }
2545 }
2546 }
2547 }
2548
2549 //
2550 // Add frontier edge neighbours
2551 //
2552 if (patchDimension == 3) {
2553 int nFrontierCellEdges = frontierCell->getEdgeCount();
2554 for (int edge = 0; edge < nFrontierCellEdges; ++edge) {
2555 // Edge information
2556 int nEdgeVertices = frontierCell->getEdgeVertexCount(edge);
2557
2558 ConstCellHalfEdge frontierEdge = ConstCellHalfEdge(*frontierCell, edge, ConstCellHalfEdge::WINDING_NATURAL);
2559
2560 // Discard edges that do not belong to the
2561 // current frontier face
2562 ConstProxyVector<long> edgeVertexIds = frontierEdge.getVertexIds();
2563
2564 bool isFrontierFaceEdge = true;
2565 for (int k = 0; k < nEdgeVertices; ++k) {
2566 long edgeVertexId = edgeVertexIds[k];
2567 if (frontierFaceVertices.count(edgeVertexId) == 0) {
2568 isFrontierFaceEdge = false;
2569 break;
2570 }
2571 }
2572
2573 if (!isFrontierFaceEdge) {
2574 continue;
2575 }
2576
2577 // Avoid adding duplicate edges
2578 frontierEdge.setWinding(ConstCellHalfEdge::WINDING_REVERSE);
2579 auto frontierEdgeItr = frontierEdges.find(frontierEdge);
2580 if (frontierEdgeItr != frontierEdges.end()) {
2581 continue;
2582 } else {
2583 frontierEdge.setWinding(ConstCellHalfEdge::WINDING_NATURAL);
2584 frontierEdgeItr = frontierEdges.find(frontierEdge);
2585 if (frontierEdgeItr != frontierEdges.end()) {
2586 continue;
2587 }
2588 }
2589
2590 // Add edge to the list of frontier edges
2591 frontierEdges.insert(std::move(frontierEdge));
2592
2593 // Find edge neighbours
2594 neighsList.clear();
2595 findCellEdgeNeighs(frontierCellId, edge, &neighsList);
2596
2597 // Check if the vertex is on the inner frontier
2598 bool innerFrontierEdge = (m_partitioningOutgoings.count(frontierCellId) == 0);
2599 if (!innerFrontierEdge) {
2600 for (long frontierNeighId : neighsList) {
2601 if (m_partitioningOutgoings.count(frontierNeighId) == 0) {
2602 innerFrontierEdge = true;
2603 break;
2604 }
2605 }
2606 }
2607
2608 // Add neighbours to the list
2609 for (long frontierNeighId : neighsList) {
2610 frontierNeighs.insert(frontierNeighId);
2611 if (innerFrontierEdge) {
2612 if (m_partitioningOutgoings.count(frontierNeighId) > 0) {
2613 innerFrontierCellsOverall.insert(frontierNeighId);
2614 }
2615 }
2616 }
2617 }
2618 }
2619
2620 // Tell apart frame and halo cells
2621 for (long frontierNeighId : frontierNeighs) {
2622 if (outgoingCells.count(frontierNeighId) > 0) {
2623 frameCells.insert(frontierNeighId);
2624 } else {
2625 haloCells.insert({frontierNeighId, 0});
2626 }
2627 }
2628 }
2629 }
2630 }
2631
2632 // Identify cells on subsequent frame layers
2633 //
2634 // Only cells sent to the receiver rank can be frame cells.
2635 if (m_haloSize > 1) {
2636 auto frameSelector = [&outgoingCells](long cellId) {
2637 return (outgoingCells.count(cellId) != 0);
2638 };
2639
2640 auto frameBuilder = [&frameCells](long cellId, int layer) {
2641 BITPIT_UNUSED(layer);
2642
2643 frameCells.insert(cellId);
2644
2645 return false;
2646 };
2647
2648 processCellsNeighbours(frameCells, m_haloSize - 1, frameSelector, frameBuilder);
2649 }
2650
2651 // Identify cells on subsequent halo layers
2652 //
2653 // The selector should discard cells in the frame, this ensures that
2654 // the halo will not extend to the cells being sent to the receiver
2655 // rank.
2656 if (m_haloSize > 1) {
2657 firstHaloLayerCells.clear();
2658 firstHaloLayerCells.reserve(haloCells.size());
2659 for (const auto &haloEntry : haloCells) {
2660 firstHaloLayerCells.push_back(haloEntry.first);
2661 }
2662
2663 auto haloSelector = [&frameCells](long cellId) {
2664 return (frameCells.count(cellId) == 0);
2665 };
2666
2667 auto haloBuilder = [&haloCells](long cellId, int layer) {
2668 haloCells.insert({cellId, layer + 1});
2669
2670 return false;
2671 };
2672
2673 processCellsNeighbours(firstHaloLayerCells, m_haloSize - 1, haloSelector, haloBuilder);
2674 }
2675 }
2676
2677 // Order cells to send
2678 //
2679 // To allow the receiver to efficently store the cells, first we
2680 // send the cells that are internal for the receiver, then the
2681 // halo cells.
2682 std::size_t nOutgoingCells = outgoingCells.size();
2683 std::size_t nHaloCells = haloCells.size();
2684
2685 cellSendList.assign(outgoingCells.begin(), outgoingCells.end());
2686
2687 std::size_t haloIndex = cellSendList.size();
2688 cellSendList.resize(cellSendList.size() + nHaloCells);
2689 for (const auto &haloEntry : haloCells) {
2690 cellSendList[haloIndex] = haloEntry.first;
2691 ++haloIndex;
2692 }
2693
2694 // Update list of overall frame cells
2695 frameCellsOverall.insert(frameCellsOverall.end(), frameCells.begin(), frameCells.end());
2696
2697 // Update list of halo cells
2698 for (const auto &haloEntry : haloCells) {
2699 long cellId = haloEntry.first;
2700 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
2701 if (cell.isInterior()) {
2702 continue;
2703 }
2704
2705 ghostHaloCellsOverall.insert(cellId);
2706 }
2707
2708 //
2709 // Communicate cell buffer size
2710 //
2711
2712 // Wait for previous comunications to finish
2713 if (cellsSizeRequest != MPI_REQUEST_NULL) {
2714 MPI_Wait(&cellsSizeRequest, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
2715 }
2716
2717 // Start the communication
2718 long cellsBufferSize = 2 * sizeof(long) + 3 * nHaloCells * sizeof(int) + 2 * (nOutgoingCells + nHaloCells) * sizeof(bool);
2719 for (const long cellId : cellSendList) {
2720 cellsBufferSize += m_cells.at(cellId).getBinarySize();
2721 }
2722
2723 MPI_Isend(&cellsBufferSize, 1, MPI_LONG, recvRank, m_partitioningCellsTag, m_communicator, &cellsSizeRequest);
2724
2725 //
2726 // Create the list of vertices to send
2727 //
2728 // On serialization there are no frame nor halo cells, however the
2729 // vertices on border faces are considered frame vertices, becuase
2730 // they will be used to link the cells on the recevier (they will
2731 // be duplicate vertices on the receiver).
2732 //
2733 frameVertices.clear();
2734 haloVertices.clear();
2735 vertexSendList.clear();
2736 for (const long cellId : cellSendList) {
2737 const Cell &cell = m_cells.at(cellId);
2738
2739 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
2740 int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
2741 for (int j = 0; j < nCellVertices; ++j) {
2742 long vertexId = cellVertexIds[j];
2743
2744 if (frameCells.count(cellId) > 0) {
2745 frameVertices.insert(vertexId);
2746 } else if (haloCells.count(cellId) > 0) {
2747 haloVertices.insert(vertexId);
2748 }
2749
2750 vertexSendList.insert(vertexId);
2751 }
2752 }
2753
2754 if (m_partitioningSerialization) {
2755 for (const long cellId : cellSendList) {
2756 const Cell &cell = m_cells.at(cellId);
2757
2758 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
2759 for (int face = 0; face < nCellFaces; ++face) {
2760 if (!cell.isFaceBorder(face)) {
2761 continue;
2762 }
2763
2764 int nFaceVertices = cell.getFaceVertexCount(face);
2765 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
2766 long vertexId = cell.getFaceVertexId(face, k);
2767 frameVertices.insert(vertexId);
2768 }
2769 }
2770 }
2771 }
2772
2773 //
2774 // Communicate vertex buffer size
2775 //
2776
2777 // Wait for previous comunications to finish
2778 if (verticesSizeRequest != MPI_REQUEST_NULL) {
2779 MPI_Wait(&verticesSizeRequest, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
2780 }
2781
2782 // Start the communication
2783 long verticesBufferSize = sizeof(long) + 2 * vertexSendList.size() * sizeof(bool);
2784 for (long vertexId : vertexSendList) {
2785 verticesBufferSize += m_vertices[vertexId].getBinarySize();
2786 }
2787
2788 MPI_Isend(&verticesBufferSize, 1, MPI_LONG, recvRank, m_partitioningVerticesTag, m_communicator, &verticesSizeRequest);
2789
2790 //
2791 // Send vertex data
2792 //
2793
2794 // Wait for previous comunications to finish
2795 if (verticesRequest != MPI_REQUEST_NULL) {
2796 MPI_Wait(&verticesRequest, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
2797 }
2798
2799 // Fill buffer with vertex data
2800 verticesBuffer.setSize(verticesBufferSize);
2801 verticesBuffer.seekg(0);
2802
2803 verticesBuffer << (long) vertexSendList.size();
2804 for (long vertexId : vertexSendList) {
2805 // Vertex information
2806 bool isFrame = (frameVertices.count(vertexId) > 0);
2807 bool isHalo = (haloVertices.count(vertexId) > 0);
2808
2809 verticesBuffer << isFrame;
2810 verticesBuffer << isHalo;
2811
2812 // Certex data
2813 verticesBuffer << m_vertices[vertexId];
2814 }
2815
2816 if (verticesBufferSize != (long) verticesBuffer.getSize()) {
2817 throw std::runtime_error ("Cell buffer size does not match calculated size");
2818 }
2819
2820 MPI_Isend(verticesBuffer.data(), verticesBuffer.getSize(), MPI_CHAR, recvRank, m_partitioningVerticesTag, m_communicator, &verticesRequest);
2821
2822 //
2823 // Send cell data
2824 //
2825
2826 // Wait for previous comunications to finish
2827 if (cellsRequest != MPI_REQUEST_NULL) {
2828 MPI_Wait(&cellsRequest, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
2829 }
2830
2831 // Fill the buffer with cell data
2832 cellsBuffer.setSize(cellsBufferSize);
2833 cellsBuffer.seekg(0);
2834
2835 cellsBuffer << (long) nOutgoingCells;
2836 cellsBuffer << (long) nHaloCells;
2837 for (long cellId : cellSendList) {
2838 // Cell information
2839 bool isFrame = (frameCells.count(cellId) > 0);
2840 bool isHalo = (haloCells.count(cellId) > 0);
2841
2842 cellsBuffer << isFrame;
2843 cellsBuffer << isHalo;
2844
2845 // Cell owner on receiver
2846 //
2847 // This is only needed if the cell is on the halo, in the other
2848 // case the owner is always the receiver itself.
2849 if (isHalo) {
2850 int cellOwnerOnReceiver;
2851 if (m_partitioningOutgoings.count(cellId) > 0) {
2852 cellOwnerOnReceiver = m_partitioningOutgoings.at(cellId);
2853 } else if (m_ghostCellInfo.count(cellId) > 0) {
2854 cellOwnerOnReceiver = m_ghostCellInfo.at(cellId).owner;
2855 } else {
2856 cellOwnerOnReceiver = m_rank;
2857 }
2858
2859 cellsBuffer << cellOwnerOnReceiver;
2860
2861 int cellHaloLayerOnReceiver;
2862 if (cellOwnerOnReceiver != recvRank) {
2863 cellHaloLayerOnReceiver = haloCells.at(cellId);
2864 } else {
2865 cellHaloLayerOnReceiver = -1;
2866 }
2867
2868 cellsBuffer << cellHaloLayerOnReceiver;
2869
2870 int ghostCellOwnershipChange;
2871 if (ghostCellOwnershipChanges->count(cellId) > 0) {
2872 ghostCellOwnershipChange = ghostCellOwnershipChanges->at(cellId);
2873 } else {
2874 ghostCellOwnershipChange = -1;
2875 }
2876
2877 cellsBuffer << ghostCellOwnershipChange;
2878 }
2879
2880 // Cell data
2881 const Cell &cell = m_cells.at(cellId);
2882
2883 cellsBuffer << cell;
2884 }
2885
2886 if (cellsBufferSize != (long) cellsBuffer.getSize()) {
2887 throw std::runtime_error ("Cell buffer size does not match calculated size");
2888 }
2889
2890 MPI_Isend(cellsBuffer.data(), cellsBuffer.getSize(), MPI_CHAR, recvRank, m_partitioningCellsTag, m_communicator, &cellsRequest);
2891
2892 //
2893 // Update adaption info
2894 //
2895 if (trackPartitioning) {
2896 // Update partition
2897 //
2898 // The ids of the cells send will be stored accordingly to the send
2899 // order, this is the same order that will be used on the process
2900 // that has received the cell. Since the order is the same, the
2901 // two processes are able to exchange cell data without additional
2902 // communications (they already know the list of cells for which
2903 // data is needed and the order in which these data will be sent).
2904 partitioningData.emplace_back();
2905 adaption::Info &partitioningInfo = partitioningData.back();
2906 partitioningInfo.entity = adaption::ENTITY_CELL;
2907 partitioningInfo.type = adaption::TYPE_PARTITION_SEND;
2908 partitioningInfo.rank = recvRank;
2909
2910 partitioningInfo.previous.resize(nOutgoingCells);
2911 for (std::size_t i = 0; i < nOutgoingCells; ++i) {
2912 long cellId = cellSendList[i];
2913 partitioningInfo.previous[i] = cellId;
2914 }
2915 }
2916
2917 // Delete outgoing cells not in the frame
2918 //
2919 // Frame cells cannot be deleted just now, because they may be ghost cells
2920 // for other processes.
2921 std::vector<long> deleteList;
2922
2923 deleteList.reserve(nOutgoingCells - frameCells.size());
2924 for (std::size_t i = 0; i < nOutgoingCells; ++i) {
2925 long cellId = cellSendList[i];
2926 if (frameCells.count(cellId) == 0) {
2927 deleteList.push_back(cellId);
2928 }
2929 }
2930
2931 deleteCells(deleteList);
2932
2933 // Prune cell adjacencies and interfaces
2934 //
2935 // At this stage we cannot fully update adjacencies and interfaces, but
2936 // we need to remove stale adjacencies and interfaces.
2937 pruneStaleAdjacencies();
2938
2939 pruneStaleInterfaces();
2940
2941 // If we are sending many cells try to reduced the used memory
2942 bool keepMemoryLimited = (nOutgoingCells > ACTIVATE_MEMORY_LIMIT_THRESHOLD * getInternalCellCount());
2943 if (keepMemoryLimited) {
2944 // Squeeze cells
2945 squeezeCells();
2946
2947 // Squeeze interfaces
2948 squeezeInterfaces();
2949
2950 // Delete orphan vertices
2951 deleteOrphanVertices();
2952 squeezeVertices();
2953 }
2954 }
2955
2956 //
2957 // Update ghost and frame cells
2958 //
2959
2960 // If the process is sending all its cells we can just clear the patch.
2961 if (!sendingAllCells) {
2962 std::vector<long> deleteList;
2963
2964 // Convert inner cells into ghosts
2965 //
2966 // All cells on the inner frontier should become ghost cells. These
2967 // cells belongs to the first halo layer and defines the seeds for
2968 // growing the subsequent halo layers.
2969 for (long cellId : innerFrontierCellsOverall) {
2970 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
2971 std::size_t cellHaloLayer = 0;
2972 if (!confirmCellHaloLayer(cell, cellHaloLayer, m_partitioningOutgoings)) {
2973 continue;
2974 }
2975
2976 int cellOwner = m_partitioningOutgoings.at(cellId);
2977 internalCell2GhostCell(cellId, cellOwner, cellHaloLayer);
2978 }
2979
2980 auto ghostFrameSelector = [this](long cellId) {
2981 return (m_partitioningOutgoings.count(cellId) != 0);
2982 };
2983
2984 auto ghostFrameBuilder = [this](long cellId, int layer) {
2985 int cellOwner = m_partitioningOutgoings.at(cellId);
2986 internalCell2GhostCell(cellId, cellOwner, layer + 1);
2987
2988 return false;
2989 };
2990
2991 processCellsNeighbours(innerFrontierCellsOverall, m_haloSize - 1, ghostFrameSelector, ghostFrameBuilder);
2992
2993 // Delete frame cells that are not ghosts
2994 //
2995 // Now that the new ghosts have been created, we can delete all the
2996 // frontier cells that are not ghosts.
2997 deleteList.clear();
2998 for (long cellId : frameCellsOverall) {
2999 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
3000 if (!cell.isInterior()) {
3001 continue;
3002 }
3003
3004 deleteList.push_back(cellId);
3005 ghostCellOwnershipChanges->erase(cellId);
3006 }
3007
3008 deleteCells(deleteList);
3009
3010 // Prune cell adjacencies
3011 //
3012 // At this stage we cannot fully update the adjacencies, but we need
3013 // to remove stale adjacencies.
3014 pruneStaleAdjacencies();
3015
3016 // Delete or update ghosts
3017 //
3018 // Some of the halo cells may be stale ghosts. Ghosts in the first halo
3019 // layer are considered stale if they have has no inner neighbours. Ghost
3020 // on subsequent layers are considered stale if they have no neighbours
3021 // in the previous halo layer.
3022 //
3023 // A layer at a time, stale ghost cells are found and deleted, valid ghosts
3024 // are identified because we need to re-compute the layer layer associated
3025 // with those ghosts.
3026 std::vector<long> neighIds;
3027 std::vector<long> updateList;
3028
3029 for (int haloLayer = 0; haloLayer < static_cast<int>(m_haloSize); ++haloLayer) {
3030 deleteList.clear();
3031 for (long cellId : ghostHaloCellsOverall) {
3032 // Consider only cells in the current halo layer
3033 const GhostCellInfo &ghostInfo = m_ghostCellInfo.at(cellId);
3034 if (ghostInfo.haloLayer != haloLayer) {
3035 continue;
3036 }
3037
3038 // Cells for which the halo layer is not confirmed will be delete, cells
3039 // for which the halo layer is confirmed will be updated.
3040 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
3041 if (confirmCellHaloLayer(cell, haloLayer, m_partitioningOutgoings)) {
3042 updateList.push_back(cellId);
3043 } else {
3044 deleteList.push_back(cellId);
3045 }
3046 }
3047
3048 // Delete stale ghost in this layer
3049 for (long cellId : deleteList) {
3050 ghostCellOwnershipChanges->erase(cellId);
3051 ghostHaloCellsOverall.erase(cellId);
3052 }
3053 deleteCells(deleteList);
3054
3055 // Prune stale adjacencies
3056 pruneStaleAdjacencies();
3057 }
3058
3059 // Compute layer associated with ghosts in the halo of the outgoing cells
3060 //
3061 // Some cells have been deleted because they are now on a different processor,
3062 // we need to update the halo layer associated with the ghost cells left in
3063 // the halo of the outgoing cells.
3064 for (long ghostId : updateList) {
3065 computeCellHaloLayer(ghostId);
3066 }
3067
3068 // Prune stale interfaces
3069 pruneStaleInterfaces();
3070
3071 // Delete orphan vertices
3072 deleteOrphanVertices();
3073 } else {
3074 // The process has sent all its cells, the patch is now empty
3075 reset();
3076 ghostCellOwnershipChanges->clear();
3077 }
3078 // Wait for previous communications to finish
3079 if (cellsSizeRequest != MPI_REQUEST_NULL) {
3080 MPI_Wait(&cellsSizeRequest, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3081 }
3082
3083 if (verticesSizeRequest != MPI_REQUEST_NULL) {
3084 MPI_Wait(&verticesSizeRequest, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3085 }
3086
3087 if (verticesRequest != MPI_REQUEST_NULL) {
3088 MPI_Wait(&verticesRequest, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3089 }
3090
3091 if (cellsRequest != MPI_REQUEST_NULL) {
3092 MPI_Wait(&cellsRequest, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3093 }
3094
3095 // Return adaption info
3096 return partitioningData;
3097}
3098
3114std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::_partitioningAlter_receiveCells(const std::unordered_set<int> &sendRanks, bool trackPartitioning,
3115 std::unordered_map<long, int> *ghostCellOwnershipChanges)
3116{
3117 //
3118 // Start receiving buffer sizes
3119 //
3120 int nSendRanks = sendRanks.size();
3121
3122 std::vector<MPI_Request> cellsSizeRequests(nSendRanks, MPI_REQUEST_NULL);
3123 std::vector<MPI_Request> verticesSizeRequests(nSendRanks, MPI_REQUEST_NULL);
3124
3125 std::vector<long> cellsBufferSizes(nSendRanks);
3126 std::vector<long> verticesBufferSizes(nSendRanks);
3127
3128 std::unordered_map<int, int> sendRankIndexes;
3129 sendRankIndexes.reserve(nSendRanks);
3130
3131 for (int sendRank : sendRanks) {
3132 int sendRankIndex = sendRankIndexes.size();
3133 sendRankIndexes[sendRank] = sendRankIndex;
3134
3135 // Cell buffer size
3136 long &cellsBufferSize = cellsBufferSizes[sendRankIndex];
3137 MPI_Request &cellsSizeRequest = cellsSizeRequests[sendRankIndex];
3138 MPI_Irecv(&cellsBufferSize, 1, MPI_LONG, sendRank, m_partitioningCellsTag, m_communicator, &cellsSizeRequest);
3139
3140 // Vertex buffer size
3141 long &verticesBufferSize = verticesBufferSizes[sendRankIndex];
3142 MPI_Request &verticesSizeRequest = verticesSizeRequests[sendRankIndex];
3143 MPI_Irecv(&verticesBufferSize, 1, MPI_LONG, sendRank, m_partitioningVerticesTag, m_communicator, &verticesSizeRequest);
3144 }
3145
3146 // Initialize data structured for data exchange
3147 std::vector<MPI_Request> cellsRequests(nSendRanks, MPI_REQUEST_NULL);
3148 std::vector<MPI_Request> verticesRequests(nSendRanks, MPI_REQUEST_NULL);
3149
3150 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<IBinaryStream>> cellsBuffers(nSendRanks);
3151 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<IBinaryStream>> verticesBuffers(nSendRanks);
3152
3153 // Fill partitioning info
3154 std::vector<adaption::Info> partitioningData;
3155 if (trackPartitioning) {
3156 partitioningData.resize(nSendRanks);
3157 for (int sendRank : sendRanks) {
3158 int sendRankIndex = sendRankIndexes.at(sendRank);
3159
3160 adaption::Info &partitioningInfo = partitioningData[sendRankIndex];
3161 partitioningInfo.entity = adaption::ENTITY_CELL;
3162 partitioningInfo.type = adaption::TYPE_PARTITION_RECV;
3163 partitioningInfo.rank = sendRank;
3164 }
3165 }
3166
3167 // Mark border interfaces of ghost cells as dangling
3168 //
3169 // We may received cells that connect to the existing mesh through one
3170 // of the faces that are now borders. Marking those border interfaces as
3171 // dangling allows to delete them and create new internal interfaces.
3172 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() != INTERFACES_NONE) {
3173 CellConstIterator endItr = ghostCellConstEnd();
3174 for (CellConstIterator itr = ghostCellConstBegin(); itr != endItr; ++itr) {
3175 const Cell &cell = *itr;
3176 const long *interfaces = cell.getInterfaces();
3177 const int nCellInterfaces = cell.getInterfaceCount();
3178
3179 setCellAlterationFlags(cell.getId(), FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
3180
3181 for (int k = 0; k < nCellInterfaces; ++k) {
3182 long interfaceId = interfaces[k];
3183 const Interface &interface = getInterface(interfaceId);
3184 if (interface.isBorder()) {
3185 setInterfaceAlterationFlags(interfaceId, FLAG_DANGLING);
3186 }
3187 }
3188 }
3189 }
3190
3191 // Receive data
3192 int patchRank = getRank();
3193
3194 int nSendCompleted = 0;
3195 std::vector<int> sendCompletedIndexes(nSendRanks);
3196 std::vector<MPI_Status> sendCompletedStatuses(nSendRanks);
3197
3198 std::vector<long> neighIds;
3199
3200 std::unordered_set<long> duplicateCellsCandidates;
3201
3202 std::array<double, 3> *candidateVertexCoords;
3203 Vertex::Less vertexLess(10 * std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
3204 auto vertexCoordsLess = [this, &vertexLess, &candidateVertexCoords](const long &id_1, const long &id_2)
3205 {
3206 const std::array<double, 3> &coords_1 = (id_1 >= 0) ? this->getVertex(id_1).getCoords() : *candidateVertexCoords;
3207 const std::array<double, 3> &coords_2 = (id_2 >= 0) ? this->getVertex(id_2).getCoords() : *candidateVertexCoords;
3208
3209 return vertexLess(coords_1, coords_2);
3210 };
3211 std::set<long, decltype(vertexCoordsLess)> duplicateVerticesCandidates(vertexCoordsLess);
3212
3213 std::unordered_map<long, long> verticesMap;
3214
3215 std::unordered_set<long> validReceivedAdjacencies;
3216 std::vector<long> addedCells;
3217 std::unordered_map<long, FlatVector2D<long>> duplicateCellsReceivedAdjacencies;
3218 std::unordered_map<long, long> cellsMap;
3219
3220 std::unordered_set<int> awaitingSendRanks = sendRanks;
3221 while (!awaitingSendRanks.empty()) {
3222 //
3223 // Duplicate cell and vertex candidates
3224 //
3225
3226 // Duplicate cell candidates
3227 //
3228 // The sender is sending a halo of cells surroudning the cells explicitly
3229 // marked for sending. This halo will be used for connecting the received
3230 // cells to the existing ones and to build the ghosts.
3231 //
3232 // We may receive duplicate cells for ghost targets and ghost sources. The
3233 // data structures that contains the list of these cells may not be updated
3234 // so we need to build the list on the fly. THe list will contain ghost
3235 // cells (target) and their neighbours (sources).
3236 duplicateCellsCandidates.clear();
3237 std::vector<long> firstHaloLayerCells;
3238 for (const auto &ghostOwnerEntry : m_ghostCellInfo) {
3239 long ghostId = ghostOwnerEntry.first;
3240
3241 duplicateCellsCandidates.insert(ghostId);
3242 if (getCellHaloLayer(ghostId) == 0) {
3243 firstHaloLayerCells.push_back(ghostId);
3244 }
3245 }
3246
3247 auto duplicateCandidatesSelector = [this](long cellId) {
3248 BITPIT_UNUSED(cellId);
3249
3250 return (m_ghostCellInfo.count(cellId) == 0);
3251 };
3252
3253 auto duplicateCandidatesBuilder = [&duplicateCellsCandidates](long cellId, int layer) {
3254 BITPIT_UNUSED(layer);
3255
3256 duplicateCellsCandidates.insert({cellId});
3257
3258 return false;
3259 };
3260
3261 processCellsNeighbours(firstHaloLayerCells, m_haloSize, duplicateCandidatesSelector, duplicateCandidatesBuilder);
3262
3263 // Duplicate vertex candidates
3264 //
3265 // During normal partitioning, vertices of the duplicate cells candidates
3266 // are candidates for duplicate vertices.
3267 //
3268 // During mesh serialization, we will not receive duplicate cells, but in
3269 // order to link the recevied cells with the current one we still need to
3270 // properly identify duplicate vertices. Since we have delete all ghost
3271 // information, all the vertices of border faces need to be added to the
3272 // duplicate vertex candidates.
3273 duplicateVerticesCandidates.clear();
3274 if (!m_partitioningSerialization) {
3275 for (long cellId : duplicateCellsCandidates) {
3276 const Cell &cell = m_cells.at(cellId);
3277 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
3278 for (long vertexId : cellVertexIds) {
3279 duplicateVerticesCandidates.insert(vertexId);
3280 }
3281 }
3282 } else {
3283 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
3284 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3285 for (int face = 0; face < nCellFaces; ++face) {
3286 if (!cell.isFaceBorder(face)) {
3287 continue;
3288 }
3289
3290 int nFaceVertices = cell.getFaceVertexCount(face);
3291 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
3292 long vertexId = cell.getFaceVertexId(face, k);
3293 duplicateVerticesCandidates.insert(vertexId);
3294 }
3295 }
3296 }
3297 }
3298
3299 //
3300 // Identify rank that is sending data
3301 //
3302 // We need to start the receives and identify a rank for which both
3303 // cell and vertex recevies are active.
3304 int sendRank = -1;
3305 while (sendRank < 0) {
3306 // Start receiving vertices
3307 MPI_Waitsome(nSendRanks, verticesSizeRequests.data(), &nSendCompleted, sendCompletedIndexes.data(), sendCompletedStatuses.data());
3308 for (int i = 0; i < nSendCompleted; ++i) {
3309 int sourceIndex = sendCompletedIndexes[i];
3310 int sourceRank = sendCompletedStatuses[i].MPI_SOURCE;
3311
3312 std::size_t bufferSize = verticesBufferSizes[sourceIndex];
3313 std::unique_ptr<IBinaryStream> buffer = std::unique_ptr<IBinaryStream>(new IBinaryStream(bufferSize));
3314 MPI_Request *request = verticesRequests.data() + sourceIndex;
3315 MPI_Irecv(buffer->data(), buffer->getSize(), MPI_CHAR, sourceRank, m_partitioningVerticesTag, m_communicator, request);
3316 verticesBuffers[sourceIndex] = std::move(buffer);
3317 }
3318
3319 // Start receiving cells
3320 MPI_Waitsome(nSendRanks, cellsSizeRequests.data(), &nSendCompleted, sendCompletedIndexes.data(), sendCompletedStatuses.data());
3321 for (int i = 0; i < nSendCompleted; ++i) {
3322 int sourceIndex = sendCompletedIndexes[i];
3323 int sourceRank = sendCompletedStatuses[i].MPI_SOURCE;
3324
3325 std::size_t bufferSize = cellsBufferSizes[sourceIndex];
3326 std::unique_ptr<IBinaryStream> buffer = std::unique_ptr<IBinaryStream>(new IBinaryStream(bufferSize));
3327 MPI_Request *request = cellsRequests.data() + sourceIndex;
3328 MPI_Irecv(buffer->data(), buffer->getSize(), MPI_CHAR, sourceRank, m_partitioningCellsTag, m_communicator, request);
3329 cellsBuffers[sourceIndex] = std::move(buffer);
3330 }
3331
3332 // Search for a rank that started sending both vertices and cells.
3333 // If there aren't any, wait for other request to complete.
3334 for (int awaitingSendRank : awaitingSendRanks) {
3335 int sourceIndex = sendRankIndexes.at(awaitingSendRank);
3336 if (verticesRequests[sourceIndex] == MPI_REQUEST_NULL) {
3337 continue;
3338 } else if (cellsRequests[sourceIndex] == MPI_REQUEST_NULL) {
3339 continue;
3340 }
3341
3342 sendRank = awaitingSendRank;
3343 break;
3344 }
3345 }
3346
3347 int sendRankIndex = sendRankIndexes.at(sendRank);
3348
3349 //
3350 // Process vertices
3351 //
3352
3353 // Wait until vertex communication is completed
3354 MPI_Request *verticesRequest = verticesRequests.data() + sendRankIndex;
3355 MPI_Wait(verticesRequest, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3356
3357 // Add vertices
3358 IBinaryStream &verticesBuffer = *(verticesBuffers[sendRankIndex]);
3359
3360 long nRecvVertices;
3361 verticesBuffer >> nRecvVertices;
3362
3363 reserveVertices(getVertexCount() + nRecvVertices);
3364
3365 verticesMap.clear();
3366 for (long i = 0; i < nRecvVertices; ++i) {
3367 // Vertex data
3368 bool isFrame;
3369 verticesBuffer >> isFrame;
3370
3371 bool isHalo;
3372 verticesBuffer >> isHalo;
3373
3374 Vertex vertex;
3375 verticesBuffer >> vertex;
3376 long originalVertexId = vertex.getId();
3377
3378 // Set vertex interior flag
3379 //
3380 // All new vertices will be temporarly added as internal vertices,
3381 // is needed they will be converted to ghost vertices when updating
3382 // ghost information.
3383 vertex.setInterior(true);
3384
3385 // Check if the vertex is a duplicate
3386 //
3387 // Only frame and halo vertices may be a duplicate.
3388 //
3389 //
3390 // If the vertex is a duplicate, it will be possible to obtain the
3391 // id of the id of the coincident vertex already in the patch.
3392 long vertexId;
3393
3394 bool isDuplicate = (isFrame || isHalo);
3395 if (isDuplicate) {
3396 // The container that stores the list of possible duplicate
3397 // vertices uses a customized comparator that allows to
3398 // compare the coordinates of the stored vertices with the
3399 // coordinates of an external vertex. To check if the external
3400 // vertex is among the vertex in the container, the search
3401 // should be performed using the NULL_ID as the key.
3402 candidateVertexCoords = &(vertex.getCoords());
3403 auto candidateVertexItr = duplicateVerticesCandidates.find(Cell::NULL_ID);
3404 isDuplicate = (candidateVertexItr != duplicateVerticesCandidates.end());
3405 if (isDuplicate) {
3406 vertexId = *candidateVertexItr;
3407 }
3408 }
3409
3410 // Add the vertex
3411 //
3412 // If the id of the received vertex is already assigned, let the
3413 // patch generate a new id. Otherwise, keep the id of the received
3414 // vertex.
3415 if (!isDuplicate) {
3416 if (m_vertexIdGenerator) {
3417 if (m_vertexIdGenerator->isAssigned(originalVertexId)) {
3418 vertex.setId(Vertex::NULL_ID);
3419 }
3420 } else if (m_vertices.exists(originalVertexId)) {
3421 throw std::runtime_error("A vertex with the same id of the received vertex already exists.");
3422 }
3423
3424 VertexIterator vertexIterator = addVertex(std::move(vertex));
3425 vertexId = vertexIterator.getId();
3426 }
3427
3428 if (originalVertexId != vertexId) {
3429 verticesMap.insert({{originalVertexId, vertexId}});
3430 }
3431 }
3432
3433 // Cleanup
3434 verticesBuffers[sendRankIndex].reset();
3435
3436 //
3437 // Process cells
3438 //
3439
3440 // Wait until cell communication is completed
3441 MPI_Request *cellsRequest = cellsRequests.data() + sendRankIndex;
3442 MPI_Wait(cellsRequest, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3443
3444 // Receive cell data
3445 //
3446 // Internal cells will be sent first.
3447 IBinaryStream &cellsBuffer = *(cellsBuffers[sendRankIndex]);
3448
3449 long nReceivedInternalCells;
3450 cellsBuffer >> nReceivedInternalCells;
3451
3452 long nReceivedHalo;
3453 cellsBuffer >> nReceivedHalo;
3454
3455 long nReceivedCells = nReceivedInternalCells + nReceivedHalo;
3456
3457 reserveCells(getCellCount() + nReceivedCells);
3458
3459 if (trackPartitioning) {
3460 // Only internal cells are tracked.
3461 partitioningData[sendRankIndex].current.reserve(nReceivedInternalCells);
3462 }
3463
3464 validReceivedAdjacencies.clear();
3465 validReceivedAdjacencies.reserve(nReceivedCells);
3466
3467 addedCells.clear();
3468 addedCells.reserve(nReceivedCells);
3469
3470 duplicateCellsReceivedAdjacencies.clear();
3471
3472 cellsMap.clear();
3473
3474 for (long i = 0; i < nReceivedCells; ++i) {
3475 // Cell data
3476 bool isFrame;
3477 cellsBuffer >> isFrame;
3478
3479 bool isHalo;
3480 cellsBuffer >> isHalo;
3481
3482 int cellOwner;
3483 int cellHaloLayer;
3484 int ghostCellOwnershipChange;
3485 if (isHalo) {
3486 cellsBuffer >> cellOwner;
3487 cellsBuffer >> cellHaloLayer;
3488 cellsBuffer >> ghostCellOwnershipChange;
3489 } else {
3490 cellOwner = patchRank;
3491 cellHaloLayer = -1;
3492 ghostCellOwnershipChange = -1;
3493 }
3494
3495 Cell cell;
3496 cellsBuffer >> cell;
3497
3498 long cellOriginalId = cell.getId();
3499
3500 // Set cell interior flag
3501 bool isInterior = (cellOwner == patchRank);
3502 cell.setInterior(isInterior);
3503
3504 // Remap connectivity
3505 if (!verticesMap.empty()) {
3506 cell.renumberVertices(verticesMap);
3507 }
3508
3509 // Check if the cells is a duplicate
3510 //
3511 // The received cell may be one of the current ghosts.
3512 long cellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
3513 if (isHalo || isFrame) {
3514 for (long candidateId : duplicateCellsCandidates) {
3515 const Cell &candidateCell = m_cells.at(candidateId);
3516 if (cell.hasSameConnect(candidateCell)) {
3517 cellId = candidateId;
3518 break;
3519 }
3520 }
3521 }
3522
3523 // If the cell is not a duplicate add it in the cell data structure,
3524 // otherwise merge the connectivity of the duplicate cell to the
3525 // existing cell. This ensure that the received cell will be
3526 // properly connected to the received cells
3527 bool isTracked = false;
3528 if (cellId < 0) {
3529 // Reset the interfaces of the cell
3530 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() != INTERFACES_NONE) {
3531 cell.resetInterfaces();
3532 }
3533
3534 // Add cell
3535 //
3536 // If the id of the received cell is already assigned, let the
3537 // patch generate a new id. Otherwise, keep the id of the received
3538 // cell.
3539
3540 if (m_cellIdGenerator) {
3541 if (m_cellIdGenerator->isAssigned(cellOriginalId)) {
3542 cell.setId(Cell::NULL_ID);
3543 }
3544 } else if (m_cells.exists(cellOriginalId)) {
3545 throw std::runtime_error("A cell with the same id of the received cell already exists.");
3546 }
3547
3548 CellIterator cellIterator = addCell(std::move(cell), cellOwner, cellHaloLayer);
3549 cellId = cellIterator.getId();
3550 addedCells.push_back(cellId);
3551
3552 // Setup ghost ownership changes
3553 if (!cellIterator->isInterior()) {
3554 if (ghostCellOwnershipChange >= 0) {
3555 ghostCellOwnershipChanges->insert({cellId, ghostCellOwnershipChange});
3556 }
3557 }
3558
3559 // Interior cells are tacked
3560 isTracked = (trackPartitioning && isInterior);
3561 } else {
3562 // Check if the existing cells needs to become an internal cell
3563 const Cell &localCell = m_cells[cellId];
3564 if (isInterior && !localCell.isInterior()) {
3565 ghostCell2InternalCell(cellId);
3566 ghostCellOwnershipChanges->erase(cellId);
3567 isTracked = trackPartitioning;
3568 }
3569
3570 // Update the halo layer associated with ghost cells
3571 if (!isInterior) {
3572 const GhostCellInfo &ghostInfo = m_ghostCellInfo.at(cellId);
3573 if (ghostInfo.haloLayer > cellHaloLayer) {
3574 setGhostCellInfo(cellId, ghostInfo.owner, cellHaloLayer);
3575 }
3576 }
3577
3578 // Save the adjacencies of the received cell, this adjacencies
3579 // will link together the recevied cell to the existing ones.
3580 FlatVector2D<long> &cellAdjacencies = duplicateCellsReceivedAdjacencies[cellId];
3581
3582 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3583 int nCellAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount();
3584 cellAdjacencies.reserve(nCellFaces, nCellAdjacencies);
3585 for (int face = 0; face < nCellFaces; ++face) {
3586 int nFaceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount(face);
3587 const long *faceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies(face);
3588 cellAdjacencies.pushBack(nFaceAdjacencies, faceAdjacencies);
3589 }
3590 }
3591
3592 // The interfaces of the cell need to be updated
3593 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() != INTERFACES_NONE) {
3594 setCellAlterationFlags(cellId, FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
3595 }
3596
3597 // Add the cell to the cell map
3598 if (cellOriginalId != cellId) {
3599 cellsMap.insert({{cellOriginalId, cellId}});
3600 }
3601
3602 // Add original cell id to the list of valid received adjacencies
3603 validReceivedAdjacencies.insert(cellOriginalId);
3604
3605 // Update tracking information
3606 //
3607 // Only new internal cells and internal cells that were
3608 // previously ghosts are tracked.
3609 //
3610 // The ids of the cells send will be stored accordingly to the
3611 // receive order, this is the same order that will be used on the
3612 // process that has sent the cell. Since the order is the same,
3613 // the two processes are able to exchange cell data without
3614 // additional communications (they already know the list of cells
3615 // for which data is needed and the order in which these data will
3616 // be sent).
3617 if (isTracked) {
3618 partitioningData[sendRankIndex].current.emplace_back(cellId);
3619 }
3620 }
3621
3622 // Cleanup
3623 cellsBuffers[sendRankIndex].reset();
3624
3625 // Update adjacencies amonge added cells
3626 for (long cellId : addedCells) {
3627 Cell &cell = m_cells.at(cellId);
3628
3629 // Remove stale adjacencies
3630 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3631 for (int face = 0; face < nCellFaces; ++face) {
3632 int nFaceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount(face);
3633 const long *faceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies(face);
3634
3635 int k = 0;
3636 while (k < nFaceAdjacencies) {
3637 long senderAdjacencyId = faceAdjacencies[k];
3638 if (validReceivedAdjacencies.count(senderAdjacencyId) == 0) {
3639 cell.deleteAdjacency(face, k);
3640 --nFaceAdjacencies;
3641 } else {
3642 ++k;
3643 }
3644 }
3645 }
3646
3647 // Remap adjacencies
3648 if (!cellsMap.empty()) {
3649 int nCellAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount();
3650 long *cellAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies();
3651 for (int k = 0; k < nCellAdjacencies; ++k) {
3652 long &cellAdjacencyId = cellAdjacencies[k];
3653 auto cellsMapItr = cellsMap.find(cellAdjacencyId);
3654 if (cellsMapItr != cellsMap.end()) {
3655 cellAdjacencyId = cellsMapItr->second;
3656 }
3657 }
3658 }
3659 }
3660
3661 // Link received cells with the initial cells
3662 //
3663 // If we are serializing the patch, we don't have enough information to
3664 // link the recevied cells with the initial cells (ghost cells have been
3665 // deleted before receiving the cells). Cells that need to be linked will
3666 // have some faces without any adjacency, therefore to link those cells
3667 // we rebuild the adjacencies of all the cells that havefaces with no
3668 // adjacencis. Authentic border cells will have their adjacencies rebuilt
3669 // also if this may not be needed, but this is still the faster way to
3670 // link the received cells.
3671 if (!m_partitioningSerialization) {
3672 for (auto &entry : duplicateCellsReceivedAdjacencies) {
3673 long cellId = entry.first;
3674 Cell &cell = m_cells.at(cellId);
3675
3676 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3677 FlatVector2D<long> &cellReceivedAdjacencies = entry.second;
3678 for (int face = 0; face < nCellFaces; ++face) {
3679 int nFaceLinkAdjacencies = cellReceivedAdjacencies.getItemCount(face);
3680 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceLinkAdjacencies; ++k) {
3681 // We need to updated the adjacencies only if they are cells
3682 // that have been send.
3683 long receivedAdjacencyId = cellReceivedAdjacencies.getItem(face, k);
3684 if (validReceivedAdjacencies.count(receivedAdjacencyId) == 0) {
3685 continue;
3686 }
3687
3688 // If the send cell is already in the adjacency list there is
3689 // nothing to update.
3690 long localAdjacencyId;
3691 auto ajacenciyCellMapItr = cellsMap.find(receivedAdjacencyId);
3692 if (ajacenciyCellMapItr != cellsMap.end()) {
3693 localAdjacencyId = ajacenciyCellMapItr->second;
3694 } else {
3695 localAdjacencyId = receivedAdjacencyId;
3696 }
3697
3698 if (cell.findAdjacency(face, localAdjacencyId) >= 0) {
3699 continue;
3700 }
3701
3702 cell.pushAdjacency(face, localAdjacencyId);
3703 }
3704 }
3705
3706 unsetCellAlterationFlags(cellId, FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY);
3707 }
3708 } else {
3709 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
3710 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3711 for (int face = 0; face < nCellFaces; ++face) {
3712 if (cell.isFaceBorder(face)) {
3713 long cellId = cell.getId();
3714 setCellAlterationFlags(cellId, FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY);
3715 break;
3716 }
3717 }
3718 }
3719 }
3720
3721 // Receive is now complete
3722 awaitingSendRanks.erase(sendRank);
3723 }
3724
3725 // Update adjacencies
3726 if (getAdjacenciesBuildStrategy() == ADJACENCIES_AUTOMATIC) {
3727 updateAdjacencies();
3728 }
3729
3730 // Update interfaces
3731 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_AUTOMATIC) {
3732 updateInterfaces();
3733 }
3734
3735 // Return adaption data
3736 return partitioningData;
3737}
3738
3744void PatchKernel::_partitioningCleanup()
3745{
3746}
3747

3757 if (cellInfoItr == m_ghostCellInfo.end()) {
3758 return m_rank;
3759 } else {
3760 return cellInfoItr->second.owner;
3761 }
3762}
