4115void PatchKernel::setGhostVertexInfo(long id, int owner)
4116{
4117 auto ghostVertexInfoItr = m_ghostVertexInfo.find(id);
4118 if (ghostVertexInfoItr != m_ghostVertexInfo.end()) {
4119 ghostVertexInfoItr->second.owner = owner;
4120 } else {
4121 GhostVertexInfo ghostVertexInfo;
4122 ghostVertexInfo.owner = owner;
4123 m_ghostVertexInfo.insert({id, std::move(ghostVertexInfo)});
4124 }
4125
4126 setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
4127}
4128
4134void PatchKernel::unsetGhostVertexInfo(long id)
4135{
4136 auto ghostVertexInfoItr = m_ghostVertexInfo.find(id);
4137 if (ghostVertexInfoItr == m_ghostVertexInfo.end()) {
4138 return;
4139 }
4140
4141 m_ghostVertexInfo.erase(ghostVertexInfoItr);
4142
4143 setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
4144}
4145
4149void PatchKernel::clearGhostVerticesInfo()
4150{
4151 m_ghostVertexInfo.clear();
4152
4153 setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
4154}
4155
4163void PatchKernel::setGhostCellInfo(long id, int owner, int haloLayer)
4164{
4165 auto ghostCellInfoItr = m_ghostCellInfo.find(id);
4166 if (ghostCellInfoItr != m_ghostCellInfo.end()) {
4167 ghostCellInfoItr->second.owner = owner;
4168 ghostCellInfoItr->second.haloLayer = haloLayer;
4169 } else {
4170 GhostCellInfo ghostCellInfo;
4171 ghostCellInfo.owner = owner;
4172 ghostCellInfo.haloLayer = haloLayer;
4173 m_ghostCellInfo.insert({id, std::move(ghostCellInfo)});
4174 }
4175
4176 setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
4177}
4178
4184void PatchKernel::unsetGhostCellInfo(long id)
4185{
4186 auto ghostCellInfoItr = m_ghostCellInfo.find(id);
4187 if (ghostCellInfoItr == m_ghostCellInfo.end()) {
4188 return;
4189 }
4190
4191 m_ghostCellInfo.erase(ghostCellInfoItr);
4192
4193 setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
4194}
4195
4205void PatchKernel::computeCellHaloLayer(int id)
4206{
4207 // Early return if the cell is interior
4208 if (getCell(id).isInterior()) {
4209 unsetGhostCellInfo(id);
4210 return;
4211 }
4212
4213 // Process the neighbours until we find an internal cell
4214 bool haloLayerIdentified = false;
4215
4216 std::array<long, 1> layerUpdateSeed = {{ id }};
4217
4218 auto layerUpdateSelector = [](long cellId) {
4219 BITPIT_UNUSED(cellId);
4220
4221 return true;
4222 };
4223
4224 auto layerUpdateProcessor = [this, id, &haloLayerIdentified](long cellId, int layer) {
4225 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
4226 if (cell.isInterior()) {
4227 const GhostCellInfo &cellGhostInfo = m_ghostCellInfo.at(id);
4228 if (cellGhostInfo.haloLayer != layer) {
4229 setGhostCellInfo(id, cellGhostInfo.owner, layer);
4230 }
4231
4232 haloLayerIdentified = true;
4233
4234 return true;
4235 }
4236
4237 return false;
4238 };
4239
4240 processCellsNeighbours(layerUpdateSeed, m_haloSize, layerUpdateSelector, layerUpdateProcessor);
4241
4242 if (!haloLayerIdentified) {
4243 throw std::runtime_error ("Unable to identify the halo layer of the cell.");
4244 }
4245}
4246
4250void PatchKernel::clearGhostCellsInfo()
4251{
4252 m_ghostCellInfo.clear();
4253
4254 setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
4255}
4256
4265bool PatchKernel::arePartitioningInfoDirty(bool global) const
4266{
4267 if (!isPartitioned()) {
4268 return false;
4269 }
4270
4271 bool partitioningInfoDirty = m_partitioningInfoDirty;
4272 if (global) {
4273 const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
4274 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &partitioningInfoDirty, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LOR, communicator);
4275 }
4276
4277 return partitioningInfoDirty;
4278}
4279
4285void PatchKernel::setPartitioningInfoDirty(bool dirty)
4286{
4287 if (dirty && !isPartitioned()) {
4288 return;
4289 }
4290
4291 m_partitioningInfoDirty = dirty;
4292}
4293
4300void PatchKernel::updatePartitioningInfo(bool forcedUpdated)
4301{
4302 // Check if ghost information are dirty
4303 if (!forcedUpdated && !arePartitioningInfoDirty()) {
4304 return;
4305 }
4306
4307 // Cell exchange data
4308 updateGhostCellExchangeInfo();
4309
4310 // Vertex exchange data
4311 updateGhostVertexExchangeInfo();
4312
4313 // Update patch owner
4314 updateOwner();
4315
4316 // Partitioning information are now up-to-date
4317 setPartitioningInfoDirty(false);
4318}
4319
4352void PatchKernel::updateGhostVertexExchangeInfo()
4353{
4354 // Patch information
4355 int patchRank = getRank();
4356
4357 // Idenfity owners of target and source vertices
4358 std::unordered_map<long, int> exchangeVertexOwners = evaluateExchangeVertexOwners();
4359
4360 //
4361 // Clear ghosts
4362 //
4363
4364 // List of vertices that are no more ghosts.
4365 //
4366 // Previous ghost vertices will be converted to internal vertices.
4367 VertexConstIterator previousBeginItr = ghostVertexConstBegin();
4368 VertexConstIterator previousEndItr = ghostVertexConstEnd();
4369
4370 std::vector<long> previousGhosts;
4371 previousGhosts.reserve(getGhostVertexCount());
4372 for (VertexConstIterator vertexItr = previousBeginItr; vertexItr != previousEndItr; ++vertexItr) {
4373 long vertexId = vertexItr.getId();
4374 if (exchangeVertexOwners.count(vertexId) != 0) {
4375 continue;
4376 }
4377
4378 previousGhosts.push_back(vertexId);
4379 }
4380
4381 // Convert previous ghosts to internal vertices
4382 for (long vertexId : previousGhosts) {
4383 ghostVertex2InternalVertex(vertexId);
4384 }
4385
4386 //
4387 // Initialize ghost
4388 //
4389
4390 // List of new ghost vertices
4391 //
4392 // Vertices need to be sorted with their order in the storage.
4393 std::map<std::size_t, long> newGhosts;
4394 for (const auto &entry : exchangeVertexOwners) {
4395 int vertexOwner = entry.second;
4396 if (vertexOwner == patchRank) {
4397 continue;
4398 }
4399
4400 long vertexId = entry.first;
4401 VertexIterator vertexItr = m_vertices.find(vertexId);
4402 if (!vertexItr->isInterior()) {
4403 continue;
4404 }
4405
4406 newGhosts.insert({vertexItr.getRawIndex(), vertexId});
4407 }
4408
4409 // Set the owner of the existing ghosts
4410 VertexConstIterator beginItr = ghostVertexConstEnd();
4411 VertexConstIterator endItr = ghostVertexConstEnd();
4412
4413 for (VertexConstIterator vertexItr = beginItr; vertexItr != endItr; ++vertexItr) {
4414 long vertexId = vertexItr->getId();
4415 int vertexOwner = exchangeVertexOwners.at(vertexId);
4416 setGhostVertexInfo(vertexId, vertexOwner);
4417 }
4418
4419 // Create new ghosts
4420 //
4421 // The list of ghosts is processed backwards to reduce the number of
4422 // vertices that need to be swapped (there is a high probability that
4423 // most of the ghost vertices are already at the end of the storage).
4424 //
4425 // If a vertex is already a ghost, we still need to update its owner.
4426 for (auto iter = newGhosts.rbegin(); iter != newGhosts.rend(); ++iter) {
4427 long vertexId = iter->second;
4428 int vertexOwner = exchangeVertexOwners.at(vertexId);
4429 internalVertex2GhostVertex(vertexId, vertexOwner);
4430 }
4431
4432 //
4433 // Identify exchange targets
4434 //
4435 // See function Doxygen documentation for an explanation of which ranks are
4436 // involved in vertex data exchange.
4437
4438 // Clear targets
4439 m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets.clear();
4440
4441 // Update targets
4442 for (const auto &entry : m_ghostVertexInfo) {
4443 int ghostVertexOwner = entry.second.owner;
4444 long ghostVertexId = entry.first;
4445 m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets[ghostVertexOwner].push_back(ghostVertexId);
4446 }
4447
4448 // Sort the targets
4449 for (auto &entry : m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets) {
4450 std::vector<long> &rankTargets = entry.second;
4451 std::sort(rankTargets.begin(), rankTargets.end(), VertexPositionLess(*this));
4452 }
4453
4454 //
4455 // Identify exchange sources
4456 //
4457 // See function Doxygen documentation for an explanation of which ranks are
4458 // involved in vertex data exchange.
4459
4460 // Compute source distribution
4461 //
4462 // For each source cell, we need to know the ranks that have that cell
4463 // among their ghosts.
4464 std::unordered_map<long, std::unordered_set<int>> sourcesDistribution;
4465 for (const auto &entry : getGhostCellExchangeSources()) {
4466 const int rank = entry.first;
4467 const std::vector<long> &cellList = entry.second;
4468 for (long cellId : cellList) {
4469 sourcesDistribution[cellId].insert(rank);
4470 }
4471 }
4472
4473 // Initialize data communicator
4474 DataCommunicator sourceDataCommunicator(getCommunicator());
4475
4476 // Prepare the sends
4477 for (const auto &entry : getGhostCellExchangeSources()) {
4478 const int rank = entry.first;
4479 const std::vector<long> &cellList = entry.second;
4480
4481 // Set the sends
4482 std::size_t bufferSize = 0;
4483 for (long cellId : cellList) {
4484 bufferSize += sizeof(int) + sizeof(int) * sourcesDistribution[cellId].size();
4485 }
4486 sourceDataCommunicator.setSend(rank, bufferSize);
4487
4488 // Fill send buffer
4489 SendBuffer &buffer = sourceDataCommunicator.getSendBuffer(rank);
4490 for (long cellId : cellList) {
4491 std::unordered_set<int> &cellRankDistribution = sourcesDistribution.at(cellId);
4492 int cellRankDistributionSize = cellRankDistribution.size();
4493
4494 buffer << static_cast<int>(cellRankDistributionSize);
4495 for (int sourceRank : cellRankDistribution) {
4496 buffer << sourceRank;
4497 }
4498 }
4499 }
4500
4501 // Discover the receives
4502 sourceDataCommunicator.discoverRecvs();
4503
4504 // Start the communications
4505 sourceDataCommunicator.startAllRecvs();
4506 sourceDataCommunicator.startAllSends();
4507
4508 // Clear the sources
4509 m_ghostVertexExchangeSources.clear();
4510
4511 // Initialize list of unique sources
4512 std::unordered_map<long, std::unordered_set<int>> uniqueSources;
4513
4514 // Identifiy sources for ranks defined by source cells
4515 for (auto &entry : m_ghostCellExchangeSources) {
4516 int rank = entry.first;
4517
4518 // Identify unique sources
4519 for (long cellId : entry.second) {
4520 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
4521 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
4522 for (long vertexId : cellVertexIds) {
4523 // Ghost vertices are not sources.
4524 if (m_ghostVertexInfo.count(vertexId) > 0) {
4525 continue;
4526 }
4527
4528 // Add the source to the list
4529 uniqueSources[rank].insert(vertexId);
4530 }
4531 }
4532 }
4533
4534 // Identifiy sources for ranks defined by target cells
4535 //
4536 // For each ghost we receive the list of ranks that have that cell among
4537 // their ghosts, then we loop thorugh the vertices of the ghost cell and
4538 // we add the vertices owned by this process to the sources of the all
4539 // the ranks that contain the ghost cell.
4540 std::vector<int> cellRankDistribution;
4541
4542 int nCompletedCellRecvs = 0;
4543 while (nCompletedCellRecvs < sourceDataCommunicator.getRecvCount()) {
4544 int rank = sourceDataCommunicator.waitAnyRecv();
4545 const std::vector<long> &cellList = getGhostCellExchangeTargets(rank);
4546
4547 RecvBuffer &buffer = sourceDataCommunicator.getRecvBuffer(rank);
4548 for (long cellId : cellList) {
4549 int cellRankDistributionSize;
4550 buffer >> cellRankDistributionSize;
4551 cellRankDistribution.resize(cellRankDistributionSize);
4552 for (int i = 0; i < cellRankDistributionSize; ++i) {
4553 buffer >> cellRankDistribution[i];
4554 }
4555
4556 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
4557 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
4558 for (long vertexId : cellVertexIds) {
4559 // Ghost vertices are not sources.
4560 if (m_ghostVertexInfo.count(vertexId) > 0) {
4561 continue;
4562 }
4563
4564 // Add the source to the list
4565 for (int cellRank : cellRankDistribution) {
4566 if (cellRank == patchRank) {
4567 continue;
4568 }
4569
4570 uniqueSources[cellRank].insert(vertexId);
4571 }
4572 }
4573 }
4574
4575 ++nCompletedCellRecvs;
4576 }
4577
4578 // Store and sort sources
4579 for (const auto &entry : uniqueSources) {
4580 int rank = entry.first;
4581 const std::unordered_set<int> &rankUniqueSources = entry.second;
4582
4583 // Store sources
4584 std::vector<long> &rankSources = m_ghostVertexExchangeSources[rank];
4585 rankSources.assign(rankUniqueSources.begin(), rankUniqueSources.end());
4586
4587 // Sort sources
4588 std::sort(rankSources.begin(), rankSources.end(), VertexPositionLess(*this));
4589 }
4590}
4591
4608std::unordered_map<long, int> PatchKernel::evaluateExchangeVertexOwners() const
4609{
4610 // Patch information
4611 int patchRank = getRank();
4612
4613 // Initialize communicator
4614 DataCommunicator vertexOwnerCommunicator(getCommunicator());
4615
4616 // Start receives
4617 for (const auto &entry : m_ghostCellExchangeTargets) {
4618 int rank = entry.first;
4619 const std::vector<long> &cellIds = entry.second;
4620
4621 std::size_t bufferSize = 0;
4622 for (long cellId : cellIds) {
4623 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
4624 bufferSize += sizeof(int) * cell.getVertexCount();
4625 }
4626 vertexOwnerCommunicator.setRecv(rank, bufferSize);
4627 vertexOwnerCommunicator.startRecv(rank);
4628 }
4629
4630 // Initialize owners using local information
4631 std::unordered_map<long, int> exchangeVertexOwners;
4632
4633 for (const auto &entry : m_ghostCellExchangeSources) {
4634 for (long cellId : entry.second) {
4635 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
4636 for (long vertexId : cell.getVertexIds()) {
4637 auto exchangeVertexOwnerItr = exchangeVertexOwners.find(vertexId);
4638 if (exchangeVertexOwnerItr == exchangeVertexOwners.end()) {
4639 exchangeVertexOwners.insert({vertexId, patchRank});
4640 }
4641 }
4642 }
4643 }
4644
4645 for (const auto &entry : m_ghostCellExchangeTargets) {
4646 int targetCellOwner = entry.first;
4647 for (long cellId : entry.second) {
4648 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
4649 for (long vertexId : cell.getVertexIds()) {
4650 auto exchangeVertexOwnerItr = exchangeVertexOwners.find(vertexId);
4651 if (exchangeVertexOwnerItr == exchangeVertexOwners.end()) {
4652 exchangeVertexOwners.insert({vertexId, targetCellOwner});
4653 } else {
4654 int &currentVertexOwner = exchangeVertexOwnerItr->second;
4655 if (targetCellOwner < currentVertexOwner) {
4656 currentVertexOwner = targetCellOwner;
4657 }
4658 }
4659 }
4660 }
4661 }
4662
4663 // Send local vertex owners to the neighbouring partitions
4664 for (const auto &entry : m_ghostCellExchangeSources) {
4665 int rank = entry.first;
4666 const std::vector<long> &cellIds = entry.second;
4667
4668 std::size_t bufferSize = 0;
4669 for (long cellId : cellIds) {
4670 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
4671 bufferSize += sizeof(int) * cell.getVertexCount();
4672 }
4673 vertexOwnerCommunicator.setSend(rank, bufferSize);
4674
4675 SendBuffer &buffer = vertexOwnerCommunicator.getSendBuffer(rank);
4676 for (long cellId : cellIds) {
4677 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
4678 for (long vertexId : cell.getVertexIds()) {
4679 buffer << exchangeVertexOwners.at(vertexId);
4680 }
4681 }
4682 vertexOwnerCommunicator.startSend(rank);
4683 }
4684
4685 // Receive vertex owners from the neighbouring partitions
4686 int nCompletedRecvs = 0;
4687 while (nCompletedRecvs < vertexOwnerCommunicator.getRecvCount()) {
4688 int rank = vertexOwnerCommunicator.waitAnyRecv();
4689 const std::vector<long> &cellIds = m_ghostCellExchangeTargets.at(rank);
4690 RecvBuffer &buffer = vertexOwnerCommunicator.getRecvBuffer(rank);
4691
4692 for (long cellId : cellIds) {
4693 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
4694 for (long vertexId : cell.getVertexIds()) {
4695 int remoteVertexOwner;
4696 buffer >> remoteVertexOwner;
4697
4698 int &currentVertexOwner = exchangeVertexOwners.at(vertexId);
4699 if (remoteVertexOwner < currentVertexOwner) {
4700 currentVertexOwner = remoteVertexOwner;
4701 }
4702 }
4703 }
4704
4705 ++nCompletedRecvs;
4706 }
4707
4708 // Wait until all sends are complete
4709 vertexOwnerCommunicator.waitAllSends();
4710
4711 return exchangeVertexOwners;
4712}
4713
4717void PatchKernel::updateGhostCellExchangeInfo()
4718{
4719 // Clear targets
4720 m_ghostCellExchangeTargets.clear();
4721
4722 // Update targets
4723 for (const auto &entry : m_ghostCellInfo) {
4724 int ghostOwner = entry.second.owner;
4725 long ghostCellId = entry.first;
4726 m_ghostCellExchangeTargets[ghostOwner].push_back(ghostCellId);
4727 }
4728
4729 // Sort the targets
4730 for (auto &entry : m_ghostCellExchangeTargets) {
4731 std::vector<long> &rankTargets = entry.second;
4732 std::sort(rankTargets.begin(), rankTargets.end(), CellPositionLess(*this));
4733 }
4734
4735 // Clear the sources
4736 m_ghostCellExchangeSources.clear();
4737
4738 // Build the sources
4739 for (auto &entry : m_ghostCellExchangeTargets) {
4740 int rank = entry.first;
4741
4742 // Generate the source list
4743 std::vector<long> rankSources = _findGhostCellExchangeSources(rank);
4744 if (rankSources.empty()) {
4745 m_ghostCellExchangeSources.erase(rank);
4746 continue;
4747 }
4748
4749 // Sort the sources
4750 std::sort(rankSources.begin(), rankSources.end(), CellPositionLess(*this));
4751
4752 // Store list
4753 m_ghostCellExchangeSources[rank] = std::move(rankSources);
4754 }
4755}
4756
4764std::vector<long> PatchKernel::_findGhostCellExchangeSources(int rank)
4765{
4766 // Get targets for the specified rank
4767 //
4768 // If there are no targets, there will be no sources either.
4769 auto ghostExchangeTargetsItr = m_ghostCellExchangeTargets.find(rank);
4770 if (ghostExchangeTargetsItr == m_ghostCellExchangeTargets.end()) {
4771 return std::vector<long>();
4772 }
4773
4774 const std::vector<long> &rankTargets = ghostExchangeTargetsItr->second;
4775
4776 // Generate sources from the targets
4777 std::vector<long> exchangeSources;
4778
4779 auto sourceSelector = [](long cellId) {
4780 BITPIT_UNUSED(cellId);
4781
4782 return true;
4783 };
4784
4785 auto sourceBuilder = [this, &exchangeSources](long cellId, int layer) {
4786 BITPIT_UNUSED(layer);
4787
4788 if (m_ghostCellInfo.count(cellId) == 0) {
4789 exchangeSources.push_back(cellId);
4790 }
4791
4792 return false;
4793 };
4794
4795 processCellsNeighbours(rankTargets, m_haloSize, sourceSelector, sourceBuilder);
4796
4797 return exchangeSources;
4798}
4799
4800}
4801
4802#endif
